description: **Tool Overview**:  Microsoft Edge, based on Chromium, regularly ingests updates that address vulnerabilities within the Chromium open-source software. These updates are essential as they include patches for security vulnerabilities, which can significantly affect user safety and system integrity. **Details**:  1. Microsoft Edge utilizes the Chromium framework, meaning it benefits from the ongoing security improvements and updates provided by Chromium developers. 2. It is recommended to keep Microsoft Edge updated to the latest version to ensure that vulnerabilities are mitigated effectively. 3. Users can check for available updates within the Edge settings to ensure their browser is up to date. 4. For those managing environments, automated deployment of Microsoft Edge updates can be configured through enterprise tools like Intune or Configuration Manager. 5. Regularly monitoring Chromium releases can also provide insights into upcoming updates and associated security fixes.
